title: Admin dashboard unauthenticated gate: show Internet Identity login-required screen

requirements.summary: Replace the /admin unauthenticated/loading gate with an explicit Internet Identity login-required screen and clear next action.
acceptanceCriteria: Visiting /admin while not authenticated shows a clear login-required state (not just a spinner).
The page includes English user-facing text instructing the user to use Internet Identity to log in.
The page provides a clear next action (e.g., a visible ‘Login’ button or instruction to use the Login button in the navigation).

file_operations.description: Create a dedicated Admin login-required screen UI that explains the user must authenticate via Internet Identity and provides a clear next action by rendering the existing LoginButton. Use existing shadcn/ui primitives (e.g., Card, Button styling via existing components) without editing any files under frontend/src/components/ui. Use the authorization (Internet Identity) model for the copy and UX. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update gating logic to avoid showing an indefinite “Loading...” state when unauthenticated. Render the new AdminLoginRequiredScreen when identity is missing, show a spinner only for legitimate in-flight admin checks when authenticated, and keep the existing admin/unauthorized handling for non-admin authenticated users. Wire the new screen into this page so it is reachable at /admin. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add clear English copy on /admin that admin access is Principal-based via Internet Identity only, and explicitly avoid any username/email/phone/password admin login UI or persistence.
acceptanceCriteria: The /admin experience includes English copy clarifying that admin access is based on Internet Identity Principal authorization.
No UI is added that collects or stores admin credentials such as username/email/phone/password.

The provided credential-like strings ("prantiksarkarartist", "muisc@prantiksarkarartist.com", "8910264917", "prantiksarkarartist@12") are not displayed back to end users and are not persisted anywhere in the app.

file_operations.description: Add/adjust English guidance text stating: admin access is granted only to the Internet Identity Principal configured as admin; the app does not support username/email/phone + password admin login; and no admin credentials are collected or stored. Ensure none of the provided credential-like strings are ever shown in UI or stored. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Ensure the /admin flow surfaces the access-control model messaging where appropriate (unauthenticated and unauthorized states) while keeping the UI free of any credential collection fields. Confirm no credential-like strings are introduced into UI, state, logs, or persistence. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
